TEXT.P: Efficiency can be measured for various types of input. By clicking on the buttons at left you can see graphs of production efficiency for feed (which we've already seen), land use, and water use.
What do these graphs tell you about the relative economic and environmental costs of producing these animal products?
When you are ready, answer questions 5 through 7 in the assignment.
When you have answered the questions, you will be finished with this activity.
